subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Reilly Smith and Vincent Trocheck scored eight seconds apart in the first period, and the Florida Panthers extended their franchise-best winning streak to 11 games with a 3-2 victory over the host Ottawa Senators.
snippet: Reilly Smith and Vincent Trocheck scored eight seconds apart in the first period, and the Florida Panthers extended their franchise-best winning streak to 11 games with a 3-2 victory over the host Ottawa Senators.
